verses.text: And Jacob called to his sons, and said, Assemble yourselves, that I may tell you \add that\add* which shall befall you in the last days.
Assemble yourselves, and hear, ye sons of Jacob: and hearken to Israel your father.
Reuben, thou \add art\add* my first-born, my might, and the beginning of my strength, the excellence of dignity, and the excellence of power:
Unstable as water, thou shalt not excel; because thou wentest up to thy father's bed; then defiledst thou \add it\add*; he went up to my couch.
Simeon and Levi \add are\add* brethren: instruments of cruelty \add are in\add*, their habitations.
O my soul, come not thou into their secret; to their assembly, my honor, be not thou united: for in their anger they slew a man, and in their self-will they digged down a wall.
Cursed \add be\add* their anger, for \add it was\add* fierce: and their wrath, for it was cruel: I will divide them in Jacob, and scatter them in Israel.
Judah, thou \add art he\add* whom thy brethren shall praise; thy hand \add shall be\add* on the neck of thy enemies: thy father's children shall bow down before thee.
Judah \add is\add* a lion's whelp; from the prey, my son, thou hast gone up: he stooped down, he couched as a lion, and as an old lion: who shall rouse him up?
The scepter shall not depart from Judah, nor a lawgiver from between his feet, until Shiloh shall come: and to him \add shall be\add* the gathering of the people.
Binding his foal to the vine, and his ass's colt to the choice vine; he washed his garments in wine, and his clothes in the blood of grapes:
His eyes \add shall be\add* red with wine, and his teeth white with milk.
Zebulun shall dwell at the haven of the sea; and he \add shall be\add* for a haven of ships; and his border \add shall be\add* to Zidon.
Issachar \add is\add* a strong ass, couching down between two burdens:
And he saw that rest \add was\add* good, and the land that \add it was\add* pleasant; and bowed his shoulder to bear, and became a servant to tribute.
Dan shall judge his people, as one of the tribes of Israel.
Dan shall be a serpent by the way, an adder in the path, that biteth the horse-heels, so that his rider shall fall backward.
I have waited for thy salvation O LORD.
Gad, a troop shall overcome him: but he shall overcome at the last.
Out of Asher his bread \add shall be\add* fat, and he shall yield royal dainties.
Naphtali \add is\add* a hind let loose: he giveth goodly words.
Joseph \add is\add* a fruitful bough, \add even\add* a fruitful bough by a well; \add whose\add* branches run over the wall:
The archers have sorely grieved him, and shot \add at him\add*, and hated him:
But his bow abode in strength, and the arms of his hands were made strong by the hands of the mighty \add God\add* of Jacob: from thence \add is\add* the shepherd the stone of Israel:

\add Even\add* by the God of thy father, who shall help thee, and by the Almighty, who shall bless thee with blessings of heaven above, blessings of the deep that lieth beneath, blessings of the breasts, and of the womb:

The blessings of thy father have prevailed above the blessings of my progenitors to the utmost bound of the everlasting hills; they shall be on the head of Joseph, and on the crown of the head of him that was separate from his brethren.
Benjamin shall raven \add as\add* a wolf: in the morning he shall devour the prey, and at night he shall divide the spoil.
All these \add are\add* the twelve tribes of Israel: and this \add is it\add* which their father spoke to them, and blessed them; every one according to his blessing he blessed them.
And he charged them, and said to them, I am to be gathered to my people: bury me with my fathers in the cave that \add is\add* in the field of Ephron the Hittite.

In the cave that \add is\add* in the field of Machpelah, which \add is\add* before Mamre, in the land of Canaan, which Abraham bought with the field of Ephron the Hittite for a possession of a burying-place.
(There they buried Abraham and Sarah his wife; there they buried Isaac and Rebekah his wife; and there I buried Leah,)
The purchase of the field and of the cave that \add is\add* in it, \add was\add* from the children of Heth.
And when Jacob had made an end of commanding his sons, he drew his feet into the bed, and expired, and was gathered to his people.
